<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/scalartax/customers/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint retrieves the details of a specific scalartax customer.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
